MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH66 postcode area of Great Sutton, affecting properties in Northbury Road, Hope Farm Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 1.56PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the work required to repair a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by Midnight. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.34PM on 20th January 2021.
